function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Neglect of major conservation issues during the pandemic","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Reduction in conservation funding and government commitments due to economic downturn","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Declines in conservation revenue and capacity, livelihood and trade disruptions","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Vulnerabilities in social and economic models supporting conservation efforts","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited empirical work on covid-19 and entrepreneurship","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Uncertain government policy measures","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"New variant of covid-19 driving increased transmission","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of social distancing measures in virtual programs for smes","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of financial support for entrepreneurship programs","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate government interventions for revitalizing the entrepreneurial ecosystem","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Covid-19 outbreak causing factory shutdowns and reduced production","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Supply chain vulnerability due to reliance on suppliers from countries with more covid-19 cases","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Air and ocean freight crunch due to lack of flights and container imbalance","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Behavioral changes due to the covid-19 crisis affecting entrepreneurship","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of supportive infrastructure for entrepreneurship universities, science parks, incubators","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate empirical research on the impact of policy responses on sme resilience and entrepreneurial capacity","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Financial vulnerability of small businesses","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of systematic initiatives and government interventions","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of support for small business resilience","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dependency on a single supplier increases the risk of disruption in the supply chain, potentially impacting production and operations.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited resources and financial constraints create challenges in implementing resilient practices within smes, especially during a crisis.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Resilience of smes is interconnected with the resilience of their ecosystems, making them dependent on external factors.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of entrepreneurial orientation in firms","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of resilience in the entrepreneurial ecosystem","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate preparation of socio-economic systems for future shocks","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Challenges posed by the health crisis","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Heightened focus on resilience","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Desire for autonomy, wealth, power, status, and personal achievement in entrepreneurship","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Pivoting business operations to selling face masks may lead to increased physical interaction and potential spread of contagious diseases.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of resilience and crisis management at the micro and macro levels may result in prolonged business closures and economic instability.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited management-level skill or qualification","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Government-imposed health regulations","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Changed consumer behavior","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High uncertainty level due to the ongoing crisis","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Behavioral changes due to the crisis","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Pressure on entrepreneurs to deliver solutions and overcome challenges","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Disruption of supply chains in the manufacturing industry due to workplace closures and reduced production","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Disruption and closure of businesses in the sports, travel, tourism, and hospitality industries","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Job reductions in the travel and tourism industry due to global travel bans","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Spread of sars-cov-2 and covid-19","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Spread of the virus due to economic instability and behavioral changes leading to cultural and lifestyle changes","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Hardships faced by smes in sectors with high public interaction","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Need for resilience and adaptability in entrepreneurship amidst the crisis","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Substantial spread of sars-cov-2 from patients to health-care workers due to ineffective personal protective equipment.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unknown effectiveness of portable air filters in clearing sars-cov-2 in real-world ward settings.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Presence of sars-cov-2 particles in the air of hospital wards","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Presence of other pathogens in the air of hospital wards","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Data uncertainties leading to inaccurate transmission models","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate prioritization of investigations and surveillance activities","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Insufficient understanding of movement dynamics and demographics","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"}]}
